sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The fetchmail package contains fetchmail and fetchmailconf.

sect3.title: fetchmail
sect3.para: When executed as a user, this will source that users ~/.fetchmailrc and download the appropriate mail. When run as root, users who have a .fetchmailrc will have their mail downloaded and delivered accordingly.

sect3.title: fetchmailconf
sect3.para: This program provides a Tk GUI interface to your ~/.fetchmailrc making it much easier to configure. However you will require, Python, and it must have the Tkinker module available.
